title: Kyle Sandilands shocks listeners and his co-host Jackie O as he FALLS ASLEEP live on air
text:
The Kyle and Jackie O show isn't known for being boring.

And on Monday, host Kyle Sandilands surprised both his KIIS 106.5 listeners and his co-host Jackie 'O' Henderson when he fell asleep live on air.

The 48-year-old radio shock jock was on a mission to prove that he's a man of many talents, including being able to fall asleep on cue.

Wake up Kyle! Radio host Sandilands shocked listeners and his co-host Jackie 'O' Henderson when he fell asleep live on air, on Monday

'I can also just turn my brain off and go to sleep if I wanted to,' he announced on air.

'This would be interesting,' Jackie laughed, before asking, 'Are you going to need silence?'

'You don't need to shh,' he told his co-host, 'just continue doing your thing.'

'I can also just turn my brain off ': he 48-year-old radio shock jock was on a mission to prove that he's a man of many talents, including being able to fall asleep on cue

As the radio star laid back with his eyes closed, Jackie O chimed in, 'Whenever I go and see a movie with Kyle, he does fall asleep quickly.'

Meanwhile, Jackie and fellow producers joked: 'He looks dead. He's not laughing'

Another was heard saying, 'Who's going to wake him up?, I don't want that job.'

Sixty eight seconds later, Kyle began laughing at his co-host and producers.

Sleepyhead! As the radio star laid back with his eyes closed, Jackie O chimed in, 'Whenever I go and see a movie with Kyle, he does fall asleep quickly'

'What idiots you are, you're absolute idiots... so easy to trick,' he concluded as they skipped to an ad break.

While he's used to stellar ratings on his long-running radio show , Kyle's new show Trial By Kyle suffered a dismal debut last Thursday night.

The Judge Judy-style program was watched by a mere 363,000 across Sydney, Melbourne, Brisbane, Adelaide and Perth.
description: The Kyle and Jackie O show isn't known for being boring.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
